    Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.recipemanagement
    Root package for the Recipe Management System.
    com.recipemanagement.config
    Contains configuration classes for application settings, database connections, and other system configurations.
    com.recipemanagement.controller
    Contains REST or MVC controllers that handle HTTP requests and define API endpoints.
    com.recipemanagement.dto
    Data Transfer Objects used for transferring data between processes or layers of the application.
    com.recipemanagement.exception
    Custom exception classes and exception handling mechanisms.
    com.recipemanagement.model
    Domain model classes representing core business entities like Recipe, Ingredient, etc.
    com.recipemanagement.repository
    Database access objects and repository interfaces for data persistence.
    com.recipemanagement.security
    Security configurations, authentication, and authorization components.
    com.recipemanagement.service
    Service layer classes containing business logic and operations.
    com.recipemanagement.util
    Utility classes and helper methods used across the application.
